devdoc.details: This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the modifier `onlyOwner`, which can be applied to your functions to restrict their use to the owner.

params.futureA: - The final A value after ramp
params.futureTime: - The time A should reach the final value

params._a: the amplification coefficient * n * (n - 1). See the StableSwap paper for details
params._adminFee: default adminFee to be initialized with
params._fee: default swap fee to be initialized with
params._key: the hash of the canonical id and domain for token
params._pooledTokens: an array of ERC20s this pool will accept
params.decimals: the decimals to use for each pooled token, eg 8 for WBTC. Cannot be larger than POOL_PRECISION_DECIMALS
params.lpTokenName: the long-form name of the token to be deployed
params.lpTokenSymbol: the short symbol for the token to be deployed
params.lpTokenTargetAddress: the address of an existing LPToken contract to use as a target

params.futureA: the new A to ramp towards
params.futureTime: timestamp when the new A should be reached
params.key: Hash of the canonical domain and id
Hash of the canonical domain and id
params.newAdminFee: new admin fee to be applied on future transactions

params.key: Hash of the canonical domain and id
params.newSwapFee: new swap fee to be applied on future transactions

params.key: Hash of the canonical domain and id
Hash of the canonical domain and id

devdoc.title: SwapAdminFacet

AdminFeesSet(bytes32,uint256,address).notice: Emitted when the owner sets admin fees

AdminFeesWithdrawn(bytes32,address).notice: Emitted when the owner withdraws admin fees

RampAStarted(bytes32,uint256,uint256,add.notice: Emitted when the owner starts ramping up or down the A parameter

RampAStopped(bytes32,address).notice: Emitted when the owner stops ramping up or down the A parameter

SwapFeesSet(bytes32,uint256,address).notice: Emitted when the owner sets swap fees

initializeSwap(bytes32,address[],uint8[].notice: Initializes this Swap contract with the given parameters. This will also clone a LPToken contract that represents users' LP positions. The owner of LPToken will be this contract - which means only this contract is allowed to mint/burn tokens.

rampA(bytes32,uint256,uint256).notice: Start ramping up or down A parameter towards given futureA and futureTime Checks if the change is too rapid, and commits the new A value only when it falls under the limit range.

setSwapAdminFee(bytes32,uint256).notice: Update the admin fee. Admin fee takes portion of the swap fee.

setSwapFee(bytes32,uint256).notice: Update the swap fee to be applied on swaps

stopRampA(bytes32).notice: Stop ramping A immediately. Reverts if ramp A is already stopped.

withdrawSwapAdminFees(bytes32).notice: Withdraw all admin fees to the contract owner

userdoc.notice: Contract module which exposes only-admin controls for the StableSwapFacet contract.
